home.title: Home
home.description: Create and share your wishlists, organize gift exchanges, and find gift inspiration with Gifters.
home.keywords: wishlist, gifts, gift exchange, organization, sharing, family, friends

login.title: Login
login.description: Log in to your Gifters account to access your wishlists and groups.

register.title: Register
register.description: Create a free Gifters account and start organizing your gifts and events today.

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.description: Your personal Gifters space - manage your lists, groups and upcoming events.

features.title: Features
features.description: Discover all Gifters features: wishlists, groups, gift exchanges and more.
features.keywords: features, wishlists, groups, gift exchange, sharing, gifts

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: Have a question or suggestion? Contact us through our online form or find our contact information.
contact.keywords: contact, help, support, questions, form, assistance

myGifts.title: My Gifts
myGifts.description: Manage your wishlists and gift ideas in your personal space.
myGifts.keywords: my gifts, wishlists, gift ideas, personal space

myGroups.title: My Groups
myGroups.description: Manage your groups of friends and family to share your lists and organize events.
myGroups.keywords: my groups, groups, lists, events, gifts

events.title: Events
events.description: Organize and manage your events and gift exchanges for all special occasions.
events.keywords: events, gift exchanges, special occasions, gifts

profile.title: Profile
profile.description: Manage your personal information and preferences on Gifters.
